-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense


create user [lipeng@microsoft.com] from external provider

execute sp_addrolemember 'db_owner', 'prlangad@microsoft.com'

GRANT SELECT ON security.CustomerPIIData TO [lipeng@microsoft.com]


select * from security.CustomerPIIData


GRANT select ON SCHEMA :: security TO [lipeng@microsoft.com];  



select * from wwi.DimCity
